text: Bulleromyces is a genus of fungi in the family Tremellaceae. The genus is monotypic, containing the single species Bulleromyces albus, which has a widespread distribution in north temperate areas. It is an anamorphic form of Bullera. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Tremellomycetes Category:Monotypic Basidiomycota genera
title: Bulleromyces
